NAME

META_DIBSTRETCHBLT

NEAREST API CALL

#include <windows.h>
BOOL32 StretchBlt
(
	HDC32 hdcDst,
	INT32 xDst,
	INT32 yDst,
	INT32 widthDst,
	INT32 heightDst,
	HDC32 hdcSrc,
	INT32 xSrc,
	INT32 ySrc,
	INT32 widthSrc,
	INT32 heightSrc,
	DWORD rop
);

DESCRIPTION

U16Value
0rop
1
2ySrc
3xSrc
4src height
5src width
6dest height
7dest width
8yDest
9xDest
10 until the endthe full dib
DibStretchBlt stretches a dib of src height and src width (from location ySrc and xSrc ?) to the destination x and y, with the dest width and height, transformed by the rop.

back
